about_the_game:
IMPORTANT, READ CAREFULLY!


This DLC adds full content of the following game on Steam:

to the Non-Linear Text Quests.

Differences between the game added with this DLC and the standalone version:
  • You won't get the corresponding trading cards for the game, to get it you should buy the standalone version instead of this DLC.
  • You won't get the corresponding achievements for the game, to get it you should buy the standalone version instead of this DLC.
  • The price of this DLC is less than the price of the standalone version.
  • The content of the game will be the same as the standalone version.

So, if you want to just play the game but you are not interested in the trading cards and achievements, you can consider buying this DLC.

DESCRIPTION

This visual novel is a collection of alternative realities. How events would turn out and how they end will depend on your choices.

Visit wolf's den and solve his secret, or try to tame the wild beast.

Eat a pasty with mushrooms and experience something new, or feed it to the old lady, because it's her favorite filling.

Find out the real reason why Wolf attacked Red Riding Hood's Grandmother.

Features

  • Multiple endings
  • Thriller, melodrama and comedy inside one game
  • More than 150 colorful 3D scenes
  • Cross-platform
  • Steam trading cards
  • Steam achievements
  • Steam cloud

    Commercial version improvements.
  • New artwork (more than 250 images)
  • An additional quest line.
  • New quests and mini-games.
  • Text quest tutorial.
  • Steam achievements and trading cards.
  • Professional proofreading.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 13.04+, Fedora 19+, Arch, Gentoo
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 / Athlon 64 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

name: Non-Linear Text Quests - Return of Red Riding Hood Enhanced Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000
  • Processor: CPU 1 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

reviews:
“A commendable project of a niche genre about the character of a folk tale. There are so many different branches of story development and hilarious situations that you look at its shortcomings with leniency.”
6.5/10 – Special Games Club
short_description: This visual novel is a collection of alternative realities. Visit wolf's den and solve his secret, or try to tame the wild beast. Eat a pasty with mushrooms and experience something new. Find out the real reason why Wolf attacked Red Riding Hood's Grandmother.
